title: Share of Defaulters and Three-Year Federal Student Loan Default Rate among Borrowers Entering Repayment in 2010–11, by Loan Balance

metadata.source: Sandy Baum, Jennifer Ma, Matea Pender, and CJ Libassi, Trends in Student Aid 2018 (New York: College Board, 2018), figure 12B.
metadata.notes: Percentages in parentheses on the horizontal axis report the share of borrowers in each balance category.
